item.title: Database Setup - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Setup Database It’s time to say goodbye to mock datastore SymbolDatabase. This section explains the GWT Database setup. Any RDBMS accessible through JDBC should do, and we choose HSQLDB for its configuration simplicity. HSQLDB, a full fledged RDBMS, is easy to setup and requires almost zero configuration. Further, HSQLDB plugin for Eclipse makes the process even more simpler. Once database is up, we require to load it with data. For that, we are going to use a small java application, RStore.
